data.title: List of Canadian television series
data.text:
This is a list of TV shows from the English-speaking provinces of Canada. For French-language shows, please see List of Quebec television series.

Canadian television series

Listed by network: CBC | CTV | Global

Listed by system: A-Channel | CH | Citytv | NewNet | TVA | TQS
